page.title: 19COLLIEGARTH
page.content: {The farm of Colliegarth}is farmed by Messrs{George}and{John Brown,}who originally came from{Westray.}It comprises{212 acres,}divided into 25 fields. Main crop is{grass}used as either{hay}(28ac), or{silage}(70ac). Other crops include{oats}(22ac),{ {potatoes}(2.5ac) and enough{turnips } for household requirements. STOCK -{Cattle:}67{cows}(2 of which are hand-milked for own use); 31 heifers; 49{stots;}63{calves. Sheep:} 35{breeding ewes;}2{rams;}49{lambs.} IMPLEMENTS - 4{tractors;}2{manure {spreaders;}one 2-furrow and one 3- furrow{ploughs;}3{forage harvesters; 2{hay turners;}1{baler;}1{ridger;}2 {binders;}3{sets harrows;}1{silage {block cutter.} The{steading}is made up of two open and one roofed{silos}and a {slatted byre.}The Browns also own and farm; the one-time{croft}of{Hillside.
